suc-tooltip-title: This is the title of the "tooltip" containing information about a link which is showing up when hovering over a link. See this [[:File:Suc-tooltip-title.png|example]].
suc-tooltip-error:
This is the title of the "tooltip" containing information about a link which is showing up when hovering over a link. See this [[:File:Suc-tooltip-error.png|example]].

prefs-suc-options: This is the title of the section header on "Special:Preferences" in section "Appearance". See this [[:File:Suc-option.png|example]].
suc-tooltip-disabled: This is the description of the user preference shown on "Special:Preferences" in section "Appearance". See this [[:File:Suc-option.png|example]].
